data.description: Mettler-Toledo International, Inc. engages in the provision of precision instruments and services. The company is headquartered in Columbus, Ohio and currently employs 16,000 full-time employees.  The firm manufactures a variety of precision instruments and provides value-added services to its customers. Its principal products and services include laboratory instruments, industrial instruments, and retail weighing solutions. The firm makes a variety of precision laboratory instruments for sample preparation, synthesis, analytical bench top, material characterization, and in-line measurement. Its portfolio includes laboratory balances, liquid pipetting solutions, automated laboratory reactors including real-time analytics, titrators, pH meters, and other analytical instruments. The company manufactures numerous industrial weighing instruments and related terminals, and offers software solutions for the pharmaceutical, chemical, food, discrete manufacturing, and other industries. The company offers weighing and software solutions, which can integrate counter, self-service, backroom and checkout functions.
data.naics: Navigational, Measuring, Electromedical, and Control Instruments Manufacturing
data.name: Mettler-Toledo International Inc
